      • countFields

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> countFields()
        Counts the number of red and blue fields on the board.
        Returns:
        A list where the first integer is the count of red fields and the second integer is the count of blue fields.

      • isFinished

        Returns:

      • getWinner

        public java.lang.String getWinner()
        Gets the winner of the game, decided by a connection of hexagons between vertical and horizontal lines. Uses Depth First Search (DFS) to determine if a player has a winning path from one side of the board to the other.
        Returns:
        the winning player if one exists, null otherwise
